Law: Resolution 338/2014 by National Civil Aviation Agency - Slots allocation
Text: In the event of constraint or conflict in slot allocation, the following priority should be given: (I) passenger scheduled air services: (I.i) larger series of slots (operating period); (I.ii) larger aircraft (number of seats); (I.iii) higher overall operating efficiency in the previous equivalent season; (II) cargo line air services: (II.i) larger series of slots (operating period); (II.ii) larger aircraft (freight transport); (I.iii) higher general line operating services: (II.i) larger series of slots (operating period); (II.iii) larger aircraft (freight transport); and (I.iii) higher general line operating services

Law: Ley de Desarrollo Rural Sustentable DOF 12.01-2012
Text: The federal government can grant subsidies to national producers in order to offset inequalities between them and foreign producers. To grant these subsidies, the government assesses whether products are basic and strategic for food sovereignty. According to Article 179 of the Lev de Desarrollo Rural Sustentable, beef, pork and chicken are considered to be basic products and strategic for food sovereignty.
